title: PROJECT : Border
body: So I'm gonna be getting PROJECT  : {{champion:55}}  in a few days and I already have the icon needed for the border and I was wondering if I'll still get it.

replies.body:
As *Hyperion3182* brought up, the icon and skin would have to have been obtained prior to the end of the PROJECT: Disruption event end on 8/16/2016. 

I definitely recommend you check out [the FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) that they linked if you'd like complete details on the event. Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wA4EEUj1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-02T21:57:10.688+0000)
>
> As *Hyperion3182* brought up, the icon and skin would have to have been obtained prior to the end of the PROJECT: Disruption event end on 8/16/2016. 
> 
> I definitely recommend you check out [the FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) that they linked if you'd like complete details on the event. Let me know if you have any other questions.

Well I just got the skin today and i have the border.

Hello, unfortunately, all the Disruption Event ended on the 16/08 and it was the limit to craft materials.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/08/project-disruption-ashe-ekko-katarina.html 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ

"Unlock the First Strike loading screen border for a new PROJECT skin by owning the skin as well as its corresponding First Strike icon by the end of the event (August 16 at 23:59:59 PDT)."

I have  {{champion:114}}  project to create with projects , as do i now?

Will re-create the boxes that give projects?
